name: NBA Basketball Card Maker
description:
Create and design your own NBA basketball player cards.

All rights to logos belong to the National Basketball Association and NBA teams.

• Create and design your own NBA Basketball player cards
• Populate the cards with actual player data
• Easily create cards en masse for your favourite players or entire teams

Not yet supported:
• Historic NBA teams and logos
• Non-NBA teams

Feedback and Remixes

I am a new user of Figma and design tools in general so would love to get feedback or suggestions for improvement on the approach used here.

Please feel free to Remix and create your own custom cards!

All rights to logos belong to the National Basketball Association and NBA teams.
